description: Microsoft Operations Management Suite(MS OMS) – Container Solution provides real-time analytics for operational data (Performance, Inventory) and monitoring for Docker Containers.
preInstallNotes: Pass your OMS workspace ID and Primary Key. For more information about how to capture the OMS workspace ID and Primary Key go here 'https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/log-analytics-linux-agents'
name: msoms
